Metric.name: Metric
Metric.description: The Metric object represents the components of a goal metric such as its name, metric type, and current value.

CompletionDate.description: The completion date of the metric.

CurrentValue.description: The current value of the metric.

Description.description: The description of the metric. The maximum length is 65,535 characters.

DueDate.description: The due date of the metric.

GoalId.description: The ID of the goal the metric is related to.

InitialValue.description: The initial value of the metric.

IsCompletionMetric.description: Read only. If true, the metric measures whether or not the metric is finished. If false, the metric measures how much is finished compared to a targeted value.

LastComment.description: A comment that provides more context about the metric, such as its status or progress. The maximum length is 255 characters.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp that indicates when a user last viewed a record that is related to this metric.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp that indicates when a user last viewed this metric. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns the metric.

Progress.description: Read only. The overall progress of the metric.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the related record type.

StartDate.description: The start date of the metric.

Status.description: The status of the metric. Possible values include: Not Started On Track Behind Critical Completed Postponed Canceled Not Completed

TargetValue.description: The target value of the metric.

Weight.description: The weight of the metric. The sum of the weights should equal 100%.
